title: My Art Journey
script:
Anushka: Namaste doston! Aaj main aap sabse apni kala yatra ke bare mein kuch baat karna chahti hoon.
Anushka: Yaad hai bachpan mein, har deewar par crayons se ajeeb-o-gareeb chitre banaati thi? Maa daant-ti thi, par papa chupke se muskuraate the.
Anushka: Woh shuruwat thi. Phir school mein drawing competitions... hamesha second prize.
Anushka: Tab laga, ‘shayad mujhme talent nahi hai’. Par dil maana nahi.
Anushka: College mein, ek dost ne mujhe watercolors se introduce karaya. Rangon ka woh nasha, aaj tak nahi utra!
Anushka: Pehle landscapes banati thi. Phir logon ke chehre. Ab, main emotions ko paint karti hoon.
Anushka: Har ek brushstroke mein, ek kahani hai. Ek ehsaas hai.
Anushka: Abhi bhi seekh rahi hoon. Mistakes karti hoon. Par har galti se kuch naya seekhti hoon.
Anushka: Meri art journey abhi jari hai. Aur main excited hoon, yeh dekhne ke liye ki yeh mujhe kahaan le jaati hai.
Anushka: Umeed hai, meri kahani aapko bhi kuch inspire karegi. Dhanyavaad!
